001.name: Rega
001.text: Okay, don't panic. Just breath and relax, everything will be okay.

002.name: Rega
002.text: Greetings!!! I'm Rega. Surely you have know the news about the pandemic that just happened few days ago.

003.name: Rega
003.text: Let's go around my house! We will check everything before we run out from this house.

004.name: Rega
004.text: Hahaha, just joking, don't be too serious.
